content: {"locationId": "11243", "organizationId": "8777", "name": "Lend-A-Hand - Star City", "address1": "200 W Wiley St", "address2": "", "city": "Star City", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "71667", "country": null, "phone": "870-866-2070", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "33.9404681", "longitude": "-91.8461065", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "", "notes": "Lend a Hand every third Saturday of the month we hand out food boxes to people who have obtained a food voucher for the Department of Human Services. Participants must obtain their voucher from DHS by the Thursday before distribution day. The Department of Human Services is located at 101 W Wiley Ave in Star City. If you need an emergency food box please contact DHS.       On Distribution Day:  The food pantry is a drive thru.  1. Line up in your vehicle on Drew Street.  2. Have your voucher from DHS ready to give to the volunteers.  3. Pull up to the table underneath the church awning.  4. Hand voucher to a volunteer at the table.  5. Pull up to the cone and unlock your vehicle doors/trunk.  6. Wait for a volunteer to tell you that you are free to go.  7. Exit the church parking lot and leave on Jefferson St.", "contactName": "Brenda Wilcox", "contactPhone": "870-866-2070", "contactEmail": "bwilcox22@yahoo.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 72, "regionName": "Arkansas Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1c4a6bd3-8e23-4c7c-b75a-6bd6f5204146.png", "website": "https://arkansasfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Monday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Tuesday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Wednesday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Thursday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM", "Friday 8:00 AM-12:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
